name: koa-learning
description: Koa aims to "fix and replace node", whereas Express "augments node". - Koa uses `promises` and `async` functions to rid apps of callback hell and simplify error handling. - It exposes its own `ctx.request` and `ctx.response` objects instead of node's req and res objects. - Koa can be viewed as an abstraction of node.js's http modules, where as Express is an application framework for node.js
author: Abhishek Bharti
